name: DommeGer's Plane
storyline: DommeGER is on a flight and it happens an accident thats why he needs to fly fast to survive the storm behind him. If hes to slow or crashes he and his crew dies.
summary: A Game Made by the Game Developer from the Game Studio "DommeGER". Its about a plane which wants to reach his goal and escape from the earth to save DommeGER's life and the life from his crew.
